statements: SELECT user_id, browser_history, purchase_history FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, browser_history FROM user_activity WHERE purchase_history IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE purchase_history ->> 'total_amount' > '100'
SELECT user_id, browser_history FROM user_activity ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_users FROM user_activity
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, browser_history->>'last_visited' AS last_visited FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'

SELECT user_id, browser_history->>'number_of_sites' AS number_of_sites, purchase_history->>'total_purchases' AS total_purchases FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT user_id, purchase_history->>'latest_purchase_date' AS latest_purchase_date FROM user_activity WHERE purchase_history->>'total_purchases' > '10'
SELECT user_id, browser_history->>'last_visited' AS last_visited, purchase_history->>'total_purchases' AS total_purchases FROM user_activity WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT MAX(user_id) AS max_user_id FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 10 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT users.username, user_activity.activity_type FROM users JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE user_activity.timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(activity_id) AS total_activities FROM user_activity GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_activities > 5 ORDER BY total_activities DESC;
SELECT * FROM users LEFT JOIN user_activity ON users.user_id = user_activity.user_id WHERE user_activity.activity_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price < 100;
SELECT action_type, action_timestamp FROM user_actions ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users JOIN user_actions ON users.user_id = user_actions.user_id WHERE action_timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY action_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, action_type FROM users JOIN user_actions ON users.user_id = user_actions.user_id WHERE action_type = 'login' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT name, email FROM user_profile;
SELECT name, category, price FROM product_catalog;
SELECT user_id, product_id, timestamp FROM browsing_history ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM purchase_history WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM user_profile WHERE registration_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT name, email FROM user_profile ORDER BY name ASC, email DESC;

SELECT user_profile.name, product_catalog.name FROM user_profile JOIN browsing_history ON user_profile.user_id = browsing_history.user_id JOIN product_catalog ON browsing_history.product_id = product_catalog.product_id WHERE browsing_history.timestamp >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT product_catalog.name, browsing_history.timestamp FROM product_catalog JOIN browsing_history ON product_catalog.product_id = browsing_history.product_id WHERE browsing_history.user_id = 123456 ORDER BY browsing_history.timestamp DESC;

SELECT user_profile.name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM user_profile JOIN purchase_history ON user_profile.user_id = purchase_history.user_id GROUP BY user_profile.name ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE session_start > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 1 ORDER BY purchase_date;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 AND created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, quantity FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT u.username, p.product_name FROM users u JOIN purchases pu ON u.user_id = pu.user_id JOIN products p ON pu.product_id = p.product_id WHERE pu.quantity >= 5;
